_header: By the grace of Our Lord omnipotent
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 300.
Subjects: scripture texts, Engl. trans. of; tales, from scripture
_description: An English metrical version of the Biblia pauperum (perhaps sixteenth century) — forty-three stanzas rhyme royal

CamGon793.First Lines:
By the grace of our lord omnipotentWith suffrage of mary virgyn
                    moost gloryous…
CamGon793.Last Lines:
…That affter thys passage & vale of myseryIn blys we may
                    regne with eternall glory
